snippet.title: Making a Souls Like In A Month
snippet.description:
A Devlog about making a Souls Like Game in a month. I did this during the Boss Rush Game Jam. This being my first third person game also proved some challenges.

➤The game: https://emiss23.itch.io/clay-knight

Come hangout and chat in my discord server.
➤ My discord server - https://discord.gg/wpTPVPPGQt

Music: 
Various music made by me.

HL2 OST
Sonic Mania OST
TF2 OST
DeathSpank OST

Evan King - Weekly Loops Season 1, 2 and 3
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/

//
Making a souls like for a game jam was not a very bright idea, but I tried anyway. I'm pretty happy with the result. Managed to make some fun boss fights. Albeit the game isn't very unique, it doesn't have any mechanic to set it apart from other souls games. But as a learning experience it's good despite that.

//
PC SPECS:
GTX 1060 6GB
Ryzen 7 5700G
32GB RAM

//

Just some tags or something ;)

Made with Unity.
Melee Combat
Indie devlog
Game devlog
Unity devlog
Souls Like
Dark Souls
Elden Ring
Game development
I made a game

#unity #gamedev #indiegame #gamedevelopment #unity3d #madewithunity #indiedev
